name: Weapon
description: Entity representing weapons in the military unit

division_name.description: The division the weapon is assigned to, based on the assigned soldier.

last_checked_date.description: Date the weapon was last checked or serviced

armory_status.description: Whether the weapon is with the soldier or deposited

deposit_location.description: Specific location where the weapon is deposited (only applies when armory_status is 'in_deposit')

last_signed_by.description: Full name of the last soldier who signed for this weapon.

comments.description: Additional comments or notes about the weapon.
